mainText: Todays lead story: The eclipse in Greenville has put and incredible economic boost to many local merchants! In business, the current rate of restaurant growth in the downtown Greenville area is likely to mean more businesses earning less, read about it in the Business section of todays paper! In sports today: Local phenome Summer LaPress from Saint Mary’s School is offered a full scholarship to UNC at Chapel hill! In entertainment news, big broadway shows coming, he Peace Center announces its fall lineup, see what the line up is in the Entertainment section today! Be sure to check todays Obituaries, just to check if you’re still around!
